empty.getStarted: Let's get started by creating your first dog profile to track their health and medications.
empty.hint: Tap the + button in the header to add more dogs later

actions.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? This action cannot be undone.

form.pleaseFixErrors: Please fix the errors and try again
form.unsavedChangesMessage: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?

photo.tapToChange: Tap to add or change photo
photo.permissionMessage: This app needs camera and photo library access to add photos of your dog.

validation.nameTooShort: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.nameTooLong: Name must be less than 50 characters
validation.nameInvalidCharacters: Name can only contain letters, spaces, hyphens, and apostrophes
validation.birthDateFuture: Birth date cannot be in the future
validation.birthDateTooOld: Please check the birth date - this seems too old
validation.lastDateFuture: Last dose date cannot be in the future
validation.lastDateTooOld: Last dose date seems too old - please check
validation.nextDatePast: Next dose date should be today or in the future
validation.nextDateTooFar: Next dose date is too far in the future
validation.nextDateBeforeLast: Next dose date must be after the last dose date

auth.subtitle: The smart way to keep your dog healthy
auth.getStartedSubtitle: Your first step towards a healthy life with your companion

passwordStrength.weak: Weak - Add more characters and variety
passwordStrength.fair: Fair - Add symbols or make it longer

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
validation.passwordTooWeak: Password is too weak. Please strengthen it.

errors.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
errors.passwordRequirements: Password must meet the requirements above
errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.signInFailed: Sign in failed. Please try again.
errors.signUpFailed: Sign up failed. Please try again.
errors.signUpError: An error occurred during sign up
errors.verificationFailed: Verification failed. Please check your code.
errors.resendError: An error occurred while resending code
errors.emailAlreadyExists: An account with this email already exists. Please sign in instead.
errors.emailExists: An account with this email already exists. Please sign in instead.
errors.emailNotFound: No account found with this email address.
errors.emailNotConfirmed: Please check your email and click the confirmation link before signing in.
errors.invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
errors.tooManyAttempts: Too many attempts. Please wait before trying again.
errors.networkError: Network error. Please check your connection.
errors.passwordCompromised: This password has been found in a data breach. Please choose a different one.
errors.passwordTooCommon: This password is too common. Please choose a more unique one.
errors.codeIncorrect: Verification code is incorrect. Please try again.
errors.codeExpired: Verification code has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.blockedEmail: This email address is not allowed. Please use a different email.
errors.authMethodNotEnabled: Password authentication is not enabled. Please use email verification instead.
errors.emailLinkNotSupported: Email links are not supported in this app. Please use email verification codes instead.
errors.parameterNotAllowed: This authentication method is not configured. Please try a different method.
errors.configurationError: Authentication configuration error. Please contact administrator.
errors.systemError: A system error occurred. Please try again later.

success.accountCreated: Account created successfully! Please check your email.
success.emailVerified: Email verified successfully! Welcome to DogiGuard.
success.switchingToEmailCode: Password authentication is disabled. Switching to email verification.
success.emailCodeSent: Email verification code sent successfully. Please check your inbox.
success.signInCodeSent: Sign-in verification code sent successfully. Please check your email.

auth.passwordRequirementsText: Password must be at least 6 characters long

signUpSuccess.checkEmail: Please check your email to verify your account.

confirmation.checkEmail: Please check your email for the confirmation link.
